thread.section_title: CanvasOnSale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CanvasOnSale | canvasonsale.com
thread.title: Dana Ellis

author: Dana Ellis
title: Dana Ellis
text: The canvas was on the wall for a couple months. The canvas and backing came apart and the canvas fell off to the floor. Not a little. It can't be fixed and I expected a replacement. What I got was a credit for the cost of the canvas. That's fine, except I have to pay for shipping & handling!!! This is their fault with shoddy workmanship and I have to pay! I gave it a 2 because the actual photo on canvas came out awesome
